peril

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.Game

  • public final class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulate the main game logic for Peril.
    Since:
    2018-02-23
    Version:
    1.01.03
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy, James_Rowntree

      The DirectoryHelper that holds all the sub directories of the assets folder.

      The current turn of the Game.

      The GameController that allows the View to interact with the Game.

      The PlayerHelper that holds all this Games ModelPlayers.
      ModelStateHelper states
      The ModelStateHelper that contains all this ModelStates.

      The View that displays this Game on screen.

      • checkContinentRulership

        public void checkContinentRulership()
        Checks all the ModelContinents on the ModelBoard to see if they are ruled. This is o(n^2) complexity

      • checkWinner

        public void checkWinner()
        Checks if there is only one ModelPlayer in play. If this is the case then that ModelPlayer has won.

      • endRound

        public void endRound()
        Performs all the tasks that occur at the end of a round.
